attributes.action: re-open the Cuckoo and Wealden railway lines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The East Sussex townships served by these disused railway lines (Heathfield, Uckfield, Hailsham, Horam, Mayfield etc.) have expanded massively since their closure, placing ever more strain on the Wealden road network. Quality of life, road safety, the economy and the environment are incontrovertibly compromised. The reinstatement of the Uckfield-Lewes section of the Wealden Line, and the Heathfield-Eridge section of the Cuckoo Line, would be a relatively simple, small scale project to undertake when contrasted with other recent rail schemes, but may be seen as essential to further economic growth and continued social well-being in this increasingly crowded corner of South-East England.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "re-open the Cuckoo and Wealden railway lines."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17957


Prime Minister's Office
